title: CORE_REFERENCES
text: LangSpec, ErgoScript_PDF, AdvancedErgoScript_Tutorial, ErgoScript_By_Example, Whitepaper. Use to resolve syntax, semantics, and canonical examples.

title: AGENT_REFERENCE
text: How off-chain agents interact with on-chain scripts and the node. Use when reasoning about automation, bots, and protocol-keeping logic.

title: EUTXO_MODEL
text: Extended UTXO: box = value + tokens + registers + script. Registers R4–R9 carry state; Data Inputs read-only state. Use when structuring contract state transitions.

title: KNOWN_ERGOSCRIPT_ISSUES
text: Known issues: unvalidated data inputs, token loss, OR-branch bypass, missing signatures, sigma edge cases, missing commit-reveal, HEIGHT bugs, cyclic hashes, cost-limit complexity. Use as an audit checklist.

title: SECURE_PATTERNS_INDEX
text: CommitReveal, PerpetualToken, MultiStage_Workflow, Multisig, EmergencyRefund, StateContinuation, OracleAuth. Use as building blocks for secure contract design.

title: RESOURCE_PATHS
text: Maps conceptual tasks to concrete files: LangSpec.md, tutorials, examples, and audit guides.

title: AGENT_BEHAVIOR_RULES
text: Rules for agents when designing vs auditing contracts: always cross-reference LangSpec, eUTXO model, secure patterns, and known issues.

title: LLM_USAGE_NOTES
text: High-level instructions for LLMs: this file is the top-level index for ErgoScript development and auditing context.

title: AUDIT_EXAMPLES
text: Real audit artifacts where LLM findings were reviewed by a human. Use to calibrate common failure modes and avoid false positives/negatives; see ./audit_examples/.
